div.p:
Write one or two paragraphs describing your product, services or a specific feature.
To be successful your content needs to be useful to your readers.

Write one or two paragraphs describing your product or services.
To be successful your content needs to be useful to your readers.
Start with the customer – find out what they want and give it to them.

Write one or two paragraphs describing your product or services.
To be successful your content needs to be useful to your readers.

div.class: col-lg-7 bg-white jumbotron rounded pt32 pb32

div.p:
This is a simple hero unit, a simple jumbotron-style component
for calling extra attention to featured content or information.

A great way to catch your reader's attention is to tell a story.
Everything you consider writing can be told as a story.

Great stories have personality. Consider telling a great story that provides personality. Writing a story with personality for potential clients will assists with making a relationship connection. This shows up in small quirks like word choices or phrases. Write from your point of view, not from someone else's experience.

Great stories are for everyone even when only written for just one person. If you try to write with a wide general audience in mind, your story will ring false and be bland. No one will be interested. Write for one person. If it’s genuine for the one, it’s genuine for the rest.

i.class: fa fa-3x fa-gear rounded-circle bg-gamma m-3

div.p:
Tell what's the value for the
customer for this feature.

i.class: fa fa-3x fa-photo rounded bg-epsilon m-3

div.p:
Write what the customer would like to know,
not what you want to show.

i.class: fa fa-3x fa-leaf rounded-leaf bg-primary m-3

div.p:
A small explanation of this great
feature, in clear words.
Adapt these three columns to fit your design need. To duplicate, delete or move columns, select the column and use the top icons to perform your action.
To add a fourth column, reduce the size of these three columns using the right icon of each block. Then, duplicate one of the columns to create a new one as a copy.
Delete the above image or replace it with a picture that illustrates your message. Click on the picture to change its rounded corner style.

Choose a vibrant image and write an inspiring paragraph about it.
It does not have to be long, but it should reinforce your image.

img.alt: Odoo • A picture with a caption

figure.figcaption: Add a caption to enhance the meaning of this image.

div.class: carousel-item active oe_custom_bg oe_img_bg pt152 pb152

div.p:
Use this snippet to presents your content in a slideshow-like format.
Don't write about products or services here, write about solutions.

div.class: carousel-content col-lg-8 offset-lg-2 bg-black-50 text-center pt48 pb40

hr.class: s_hr_5px s_hr_dotted border-600 w-25 border-epsilon mx-auto text-center

div.p:
Storytelling is powerful.
It draws readers in and engages them.

h4.font: Good writing is simple, but not simplistic.

div.p: Good copy starts with understanding how your product or service helps your customers. Simple words communicate better than big words and pompous language.

Explain the benefits you offer.
Don't write about products or services here, write about solutions.
A card is a flexible and extensible content container. It includes options for headers and footers, a wide variety of content, contextual background colors, and powerful display options.

div.class: col-lg-12 s_rating_stars s_rating_3 s_rating_1x pt16 pb16

ul.li: Basic sales & marketing for up to 2 users
Complete CRM for any size team
Get access to all modules and features

div.p: Founder and chief visionary, Tony is the driving force behind Company. He loves to keep his hands full by participating in the development of the software, marketing and the Customer Experience strategies.
Mich loves taking on challenges. With his multi-year experience as Commercial Director in the software industry, Mich has helped Company to get where it is today. Mich is among the best minds.
Aline is one of the iconic person in life who can say she loves what she does. She mentors 100+ in-house developers and looks after the community of over thousands developers.

Iris, with her international experience, helps us easily understand the numbers and improves them. She is determined to drive success and delivers her professional acumen to bring Company at the next level.

div.h3: 50,000+ companies run Odoo to grow their businesses.
div.p: Join us and make your company a better place.

i.class: fa fa-2x fa-font-awesome rounded-circle bg-primary s_features_grid_icon

div.p: Double click an icon to replace it with one of your choice.

div.p: Duplicate blocks and columns to add more features.

i.class: fa fa-2x fa-trash rounded-circle bg-primary s_features_grid_icon

div.p: Select and delete blocks to remove some features.

i.class: fa fa-2x fa-magic rounded bg-secondary s_features_grid_icon

div.p: Turn every feature into a benefit for your reader.

i.class: fa fa-2x fa-eyedropper rounded bg-secondary s_features_grid_icon

div.p: You can edit colors and background to highlight features.

i.class: fa fa-2x fa-picture-o rounded bg-secondary s_features_grid_icon

div.p: All these icons are completely free for commercial use.

Great stories are for everyone even when only written for just one person. If you try to write with a wide general audience in mind, your story will ring false and be bland. No one will be interested. Write for one person. If it’s genuine for the one, it’s genuine for the rest.
